We make anything GC compliant

Includes all the bells and whistles needed.

Digital Standards compliance in Government of Canada is complex, we help fix that.

GC Design System

100% WCAG 2.2 AA compliant. GC Continuous Integration.

GC Notify

Send all emails and SMS under official GC channels.

GC Forms

Supports the latest GC Forms UX/UI standards.

GC Key Sign-in

Proven Trusted-OAuth hybrid for multi-role solutions.

AI Agent MCP ready

Chainable Orchestration with MCP support GC AI Answers.

API-1st Architecture

Handle tasks and data with APIs, for cost friendly solutions.

Already proven modernization model with low-code.

GC Open Source co-development. Active deployments with several GC ministries and departments, with co-development support.

100% WebComponents. The fully integrated GCDS Web Components architecture allows for rapid deployments without any HTML or CSS.

Containerized and Runs anywhere.

Vetted. The core platform already runs many gateway sites in GC, it can run in SSC CloudONE or even air-gapped for higher security and privacy on-prem.

Managed Service 24/7/365. We provide SLA maintainance and support. Fully Hosted canada.ca SRTM and ITSG-33 compliant environments.

4-in-1 Solution.

Budget Friendly

Aligns with GC cost pressures, leveraging API-events, open source and co-development for sustainable solutions.

Modernization

Adopts the new GC Design System with active CI/CD compliance, GC Notify and GC Sign-in for long-term sustainability.

Sovereignty 1st

Ensures options to keep solutions within Canada, factoring data security and under sovereign control.

AI+API Ready

Allows for chainable AGNOSTIC orchestration with most AI/LLM models, and integration with any API data webservices.
